entry.title: Friday night: Flurries or snow squalls. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Flurries and a few local snow squalls ending near midnight then mainly cloudy. Local blowing snow early this evening. Local amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light early this evening. Low minus 17. Wind chill near minus 24. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Clearing. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Clearing in the morning. Wind becoming south 20 km/h in the morning. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 23 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to zero by morning. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the evening. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Temperature rising to zero by morning. Wind chill minus 13 in the evening. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023
